title: Paris Jackson reached back to her inner Hippie style for Nicki Minaj's Fendi launch party
text:
Paris jackson has been a mainstay at high-profile, red carpet events ever since she was a teenager.

And on Tuesday, the daughter of the King Of Pop Michael Jackson, now 21, kept up with her fast-living lifestyle and attended the Nicki Minaj's Fendi Prints On x Nicki Minaj launch party in Beverly Hills.

But on this night, the 21-year-old appeared to have stepped out for her night on the town without beau, Gabriel Glenn.

in the spotlight: Paris Jackson, 21, attended the Nicki Minaj's Fendi Prints On x Nicki Minaj launch party in Beverly Hills on Tuesday

Keeping with her penchant for 1960s style, the self-professed 'treehugger' reached back to her inner Hippie with a brown-fringe suede jacket.

She matched it with flared blue denim jeans that hugged her toned womanly curves from the waist down to her knees.

The Los Angeles native perfectly matched her fringe number with a pair of brown suede boots.

For an added touch of retro style, she wore several necklaces, that included at least one crystal handing down past her cleavage, and round sunglasses.

Keeping with her penchant for 1960s style, the self-professed 'treehugger' reached back to her inner Hippie with a brown-fringe suede jacket

Jackson and her man — who are bandmates in their group The Soundflowers — have become nearly inseparable ever since they started dating in August 2018.

At first they kept their budding romance on the down-low, but it didn't take them long before they started flaunting their love and affection for each other in public.

Earlier this month, in honor of national Boyfriend day, Jackson shared about how Glenn 'is the love of my life, my muse, the light of my existence.'

Solo night on the town: It appears Jackson showed up for the event without beau Gabriel Glenn

Jackson added, 'i don't know how i got so lucky, but not a day goes by where i'm not grateful for having you in my life. thank you for being mine. for being you. for the music. i love you,' along with three steamy snaps of her man.

It was also revealed earlier this month that their band was close to signing their first record deal together.

The budding musician reportedly has written some songs about going through difficult times battling depression and drug addiction when she was a teenager, and has also been singing love songs that Gabriel wrote for her, according to Metro.

Flower power: The singer also showed off her retro style when she stepped out with beau Gabriel Glenn on October 11 in Los Angeles
description: Paris Jackson reached back to her inner Hippie style in a retro-suede fringe jacket and flared blue jeans for Nicki Minaj's Fendi Prints On x Nicki Minaj launch party on Tuesday.
